False positive, Version matcher "h2 1.3.197" matches to "h2 2.1.214"
False positive, both "hutool" and "json-java_project" are no dependencies of this project

The statement regarding the inclusion of cpe:2.3:a:org.springframework:spring-core:6.1.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:* by OSSIndex as vulnerable to CVE-2024-22233, and subsequently flagged by Dependency Check, appears to be a false positive. This assessment is supported by contrary evidence from other sources that deny the vulnerability applies to this component.
CVE-2023-35116 is filed as a false positive, according to the Jackson project maintainers.
